creator: bernardo.bennett@gmail.com
text: Add a configurable property to tell Get to set the request property "Accept-Encoding" to "gzip", and then check the response encoding. If gzip then wrap the connection input stream with a GZIPInputStream.

creator: bernardo.bennett@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 26316
Proposed patch

This is the patch I'm currently using. Haven't updated documentation or performed regression testing though.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 49453 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
